_header: Welcome Lord in form of bread
Note:
Compare Lay Folk’s Mass Book (Simmons (1879)
XSimmons, Thomas Frederick. The Lay Folks’ Mass Book.
EETS o.s. 71 (1879); repr. 1968), Text F, v. 213 ff.
Subjects: prayers, for use in church; Eucharist
_description: A prayer at the ‘leuacion’ — ten lines

BLEge3245.First Lines: Welcome lorde in forme of bredffor me þu þoldist peynful ded…
BLEge3245.Last Lines: …The þe precious body of ihesu cristWith myn herte I wurchipe
BLEge3245.Attributed Title: Here beginniþ an orysun of deuout entent to be seyd in þe seyng of þe sacrament
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 373-4.

         40 (1942): 131-46: 139.
